data.actual_result: The text is jumping up and down
data.expected_result: The text shouldn't jump around like spaghetti
data.short_description: The typing indicator can cause some texts to jump around [I was only able to repro this in HS and DAPI] (Edit, seems like it's not related to the typing indicator at all, seems like it happening randomly)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where a lot of typing happens - Observe where you can see your username#discrim, microhpone and deafen buttons
